description: This file defines data models related to attendance tracking in a class management system. It includes classes for class information, student status, attendance requests, daily attendance records, and weekly aggregates, along with JSON serialization and deserialization methods.

classes.name: ClassItem
classes.description: Represents a class with an ID and name.

classes.name: StudentItem
classes.description: Represents a student with ID, name, and presence status.

classes.name: AttendanceMarkRequest
classes.description: Encapsulates data required to mark attendance for a student in a class at a specific timestamp.

classes.name: DailyAttendance
classes.description: Holds attendance data for a specific date, including a list of students.

classes.name: WeeklyAggregate
classes.description: Contains a list of daily points indicating weekly attendance summary.

classes.name: WeeklyDayPoint
classes.description: Represents attendance data for a specific day in the week.

methods.name: ClassItem.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a ClassItem instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: StudentItem.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a StudentItem instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: StudentItem.copyWith
methods.description: Returns a copy of the StudentItem with optional modified fields.

methods.name: AttendanceMarkRequest.toJson
methods.description: Converts an AttendanceMarkRequest instance to a JSON map.

methods.name: DailyAttendance.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a DailyAttendance instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: WeeklyAggregate.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a WeeklyAggregate instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: WeeklyDayPoint.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a WeeklyDayPoint instance from a JSON map.
